## CureFit Packages

1. > Profile Package

   - Doctor Profiles Package

     - | Props             | Value                    | Type     |
       | ----------------- | ------------------------ | -------- |
       | profileList       | [response data from API] | array    |
       | loading           | true or false            | boolean  |
       | handleButtonClick | callback(profileId)      | function |

   - Doctor Profile Package
     - | Props   | Value                    | Type    |
       | ------- | ------------------------ | ------- |
       | profile | {response data from API} | object  |
       | loading | true or false            | boolean |
